text:
@GavinNewsom 2+2=5!
2+2=5!
2+2=5!

nah. repeating doesn't really work on folks with a brain. Covid19 was and being spread in the community in early February. Antibody testing backs that up. Lockdown didnt happen until March. Lockdown makes no difference.
